emails.subject: URGENT: Quarterly Report Due Tomorrow
emails.snippet: We need the quarterly report by EOD tomorrow. This is critical for the board meeting.

emails.subject: Re: Project Deadline Extension Request
emails.snippet: Unfortunately we cannot extend the deadline. The launch is scheduled for next week.

emails.subject: Reminder: Annual Performance Review Next Week
emails.snippet: Your annual performance review is scheduled for next Tuesday at 2 PM.

emails.subject: Team Lunch This Friday
emails.snippet: Looking forward to seeing everyone at the team lunch this Friday!

emails.subject: Critical Bug Found in Production
emails.snippet: Critical bug reported by customers. Need immediate fix ASAP.

emails.subject: Daily Tech News Digest
emails.snippet: Top tech stories from around the world...

emails.subject: Great Progress on Your Project
emails.snippet: I reviewed your latest updates and the project looks fantastic. Keep up the great work!

emails.subject: Invoice Due in 3 Days
emails.snippet: Your monthly invoice is due in 3 days. Please process payment to avoid service interruption.
